1.3  2006-06-08
[+] Official DJGPP support.
[+] Added support for specifying window dimensions and better usage help
    to the example program.
[+] Small speed improvement in PNG loading.
[+] Faster internal inflate.

1.2  2006-04-20
[+] Made the quantization much faster.
[+] Added this changelog.

1.1  2006-04-18
[+] Added octree color quantization.

1.0  2006-04-16
[*] First public final release.
